sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Product } from '../../model/Product'; export interface Props { onAddEditProduct: (product:Product)=> void productEdit:Product }; export default function Form(props:Props) { const [newProduct, setNewProduct] = useState(props.productEdit); const handleSubmit =(e:any)=>{ e.preventDefault(); props.onAddEditProduct(newProduct) } return (
{setNewProduct({...newProduct, name: e.target.value})}} className="name-product" value={newProduct.name} required/>
{setNewProduct({...newProduct, price: Number(e.target.value)})}} className="price-product" value={newProduct.price} required/>
{setNewProduct({...newProduct, image: e.target.value})}} className="img-product" value={newProduct.image} required/>
{setNewProduct({...newProduct, desc: e.target.value})}} className="desc-product" value={newProduct.desc} required/>
{/* */}
) }
